name: Thy Art
slogan: Turning any public (or private) space into a gallery
description: Platform and system that facilitates the displaying and buying of art in public places and businesses.

team.name: Kabalan Gaspard
team.bioHtml: Founder of Thy Art. Grew 2 regional offices 10x (Mastercard Advisors, Looker). Background in management consulting, maths, tech, and sales.

jobs.title: Co-Founder / COO / CMO
jobs.description: I have built a prototype of the platform and started gathering a user base of artists and gallerists. However, I would like to partner with someone who understands the London emerging art scene and has worked in it (as an artist, curator, art dealer, marketer, etc) for at least 3 years. Although I am passionate about art and democratising it, my skills are in sales and tech. I would love to meet a co-founder who shares this passion for art, and who has a complementary skillset. Co-founder could be COO, CMO, or even CEO. I can lead the commercial and technology side, and we would partner on the operations side.
jobs.descriptionHtml: I have built a prototype of the platform and started gathering a user base of artists and gallerists. jobs.title: Head of Location Relations
jobs.description: We've had initial success working with 2 major London locations, and are looking for our first employee who will help scale Thy Art across London and the UK as a whole, by seeking out locations to partner with.
